Class BNTweetRepository

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    @Repository
public class BNTweetRepository
extends AbstractHibernateRepository<GeneratedTweet,java.lang.String>
    Repository for performing actions on the generated tweets.

    Jonathan Carlton

      • getByConfig

        public java.util.List<GeneratedTweet> getByConfig(Config c)
        Given a Config, find all generated tweets that correspond to that object. 
             
         select * from GeneratedTweet where config = :c

        Returns:
        a list of GeneratedTweet's corresponding to the parameter.
